text:
Gabriel James Byrne (born 12 May 1950) is an Irish actor, movie director, movie producer, writer and audiobook narrator. In 2008, Byrne won a Golden Globe Award.
In movies, he is known for his roles in "Excalibur" (1981), "Miller's Crossing" (1990), "The Usual Suspects" (1995), "Stigmata" (1999), "End of Days" (1999), "Spider" (2002), "Jindabyne" (2006), "Vampire Academy" (2014) and "The 33" (2015).
Byrne co-wrote "The Last of the High Kings" (1996). Byrne has also produced several movies, including the Academy Award–nominated "In the Name of the Father" (1993).
In television, Byrne is known for his role as Paul Weston in the HBO drama "In Treatment" (2008–2011).

annotations.surface_form: The Last of the High Kings
In the Name of the Father
